topic.title: 분실한 신용카드 신고하기
topic.description: 전화로 은행에 연락하여 분실한 신용카드를 신고하고 재발급을 요청하는 상황의 대화입니다.

korean_scripts.korean_text: 네, 확인을 위해 몇 가지 정보를 여쭤봐도 될까요?
마지막으로 카드를 사용한 곳이 어디인지 기억나시나요?
알겠습니다, 새 카드는 영업일 기준 5일 이내에 주소지로 배송될 것입니다.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Hello, I'm calling because I've lost my credit card.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Hello, | I'm calling because | I've lost my credit card.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Could you please deactivate my card immediately?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Could you please | deactivate my card | immediately?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Yes, of course. May I ask for some information for verification?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Yes, of course. || May I ask for some information | for verification?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Do you remember where you last used the card?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Do you remember | where you last used the card?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: I'm not sure. I'd like to get a replacement card.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: I'm not sure. || I'd like to get a replacement card.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Understood, a new card will be delivered to your address within 5 business days.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Understood, | a new card will be delivered to your address | within 5 business days.
